title: SLaunch
content:
A simple yet aesthetic interactive Android launcher with fluid and easy-to-understand UX & UI. SLaunch also offers a scrollable UI design for launching app.


I'm developing these apps in a series. Also, I don't have so much time to develop SLaunch into something more, for I am busy studying and developing other side projects.
